Salt_Lake_City.Altadena Apartments:
The Altadena Apartments in Salt Lake City, Utah, also known as Altadena Flats and as Sampson Altadena Condominiums, were built in 1905 or 1906 by the Octavius Sampson family at cost of $21,000. The building has Tuscan columns, pediments, and dentillated cornices.
The building was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2010.
